sentence: Michigan Republican front-runner James Craig has pledged to do whatever I can? to keep that law in place should he win the governorship.
author: Cameron Joseph
title: The 2022 elections could determine the fate of abortion access for years in a number of major swing states.

sentence: There are 12 Republicans running for the GOP nomination in the August primary, including chiropractor Garrett Soldano, right-wing commentator Tudor Dixon, former Detroit Police Chief James Craig, businessman Perry Johnson and businessman Kevin Rinke.
author: Allison R. Donahue
title: Whitmer files suit to enshrine abortion rights, asks Michigan Supreme Court to take the case
